title: Cars are stopping in the middle of Pine Grove Drive to let Municipal Golf Course golfers cross.  The intention is good, but there is not cross walk and no other signage at all.  Anyone having to come to a stop in the middle of this busy road behind these good Samaritans is a sitting duck for a rear end collision and a serious injury or worse.  Please see about putting a No stopping" sign at this much used crossing."
